A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Absolutely stunning work of cinematography from Rian Johnson. This movie kept me on the edge of my seat the entire time\, and kept me guessing what would happen next in the best way possible. Adam Driver\, Daisy Ridley\, Mark Hamill\, and Carrie Fisher's performances were absolutely stunning. This is currently tied with ESB as my favorite entry in the saga. Amazing film.
